sentences.en: After the rain the lotus flowers looked fuller.
sentences.cn: 雨后荷花显得更加润泽了.

sentences.en: Doctor Thomas Fuller wrote : Was foxes, we must play the fox.
sentences.cn: 博士说: 在福克斯湾, 一定要玩狡猾.

sentences.en: Her whole soul was possessed by the fact that a fuller life was opening before her.
sentences.cn: 她的整个心灵已陶醉在一种前景中,仿佛更丰富的生活向她敞开了大门.

sentences.en: In fact, you can actually save money by buying a fuller tree!
sentences.cn: 其实, 你其实可以节省金钱,购买更全面的树!

sentences.en: Mr. Fuller is on vacation now.
One year at Fuller can cost anywhere from 12000 to 24000 dollars.
sentences.cn: 在福乐一年的费用从一万二千美元到二万四千美元不等.

sentences.en: Other leaflets will give fuller answers to the questions we have considered.
sentences.cn: 其它小册子将更加全面地回答我们思考的这些话题.

sentences.en: Quotation from British clergyman and writer Thomas Fuller ( 1608 - 1661 ).
sentences.cn: 引句来自英国牧师和作家托马斯富勒 ( 1608至1661年 ).

sentences.en: Summer clothes are invariably less kind to fuller figures.
sentences.cn: 体形较丰满的人穿夏装总是不那么好看。

sentences.en: Technology should be used to give man a happier, fuller, and richer life.
sentences.cn: 技术应该用来使人们生活得更幸福, 更美满, 更丰富.

sentences.en: The darkest hour is that before the dawn. - --- Fuller.
sentences.cn: 黎明前的时分是最黑暗的. ---- 富勒.

sentences.en: The fuller development of the parallelism was to lead to analytic geometry.
sentences.cn: 这种平行性的进一步发扬便导致了解析几何的产生.

sentences.en: The Juno Collection specialises in large sizes for ladies with a fuller figure.
sentences.cn: 朱诺系列专门针对身材较为丰满的女士推出大号女装。

sentences.en: Thicker and fuller hair would make them more confident at work.
sentences.cn: 较浓密的头发能增加他们工作时的自信.

sentences.en: This shop sells dresses for the fuller figure.
sentences.cn: 这家商店卖胖人穿的衣服.

trans.tran_cn: 漂洗工，套柄铁锤，套锤，用套锤锻成的槽（尤指马蹄铁上的槽），制毡工
trans.tran_en: a person who fulls cloth for his living
